sentences.text: More lives are lost from car accidents than ever were from guns, why not change speed limits to say, 35 MPH? Do we really need cars that go over 120MPH, or motorcycles that go over 160MPH? How many lives are lost from tobacco, alcohol, swimming pools, high fat foods, boating accidents, skiing accidents, abortions, war? Why start with guns? So you see, its really not about saving lives is it? Why not just admit it's about limiting an individuals right to self defense? I will await your answer.
